faqs.answer: When purchasing a plot, the essential documents include the Sale Deed in the owner's name, the Khata or Patta document clearly stating the land ownership, a copy of the approved layout plan from the local municipal authority, and the Encumbrance Certificate ensuring the property is free from any legal or financial liabilities.
